lead_paragraph: The Chinese men took a commanding lead in the world championships in Stuggart, Germany, as they finished with 374.275 points, a whopping 3.550 points ahead of Japan, the Olympic champion. The Chinese have a 12.1-point lead on Russia, a gap so big the Russians would need an extra routine to catch up.
